Silently, the blue jet kept moving from South africa to Scotland. 
However, his spark felt something...

AzureBlade: That spark... It is... Beautiful! I must find it! Even if 
it takes me all my life, I will find it!

He knew some of his Maximal comrades were near her, but he just could 
not leave this occasion behind. He felt great emotions and thought 
nothing would make himchange his direction.

AzureBlade: Wait for me! I am coming to meet you!

He blasts full speed towards the spark.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<"I'm beginning to think I was better off in the pod..." she 
snarled to 
> herself, standing up once again. Where to go? What to do...?>>
> 
> Good questions, both of them. But Mistra knew for a fact that she 
wouldn't 
> get any answers here. Still, her status pod held her to this 
spot...it held 
> the only real lead she had. Foolish as it was, considering it held 
no 
> information...it was all she had. 
> 
> "I don't want to stay here...not if there maybe others on this 
planet.." she 
> growled under her breath. So, one option came to mind. Even if the 
status pod 
> was of no use to her, Mistra didn't want to risk leaving it out in 
the open. 
> So, she would push it into the cave she had fallen so near. 
> 
> Easier said than done.
